claim: Carcinogenic molecules constitute 73.200% of the dataset.
extra_info: label = '+' mean molecules are carcinogenic; percentage = DIVIDE(SUM(label = '+'), COUNT(molecule_id)) as percent
reasoning: The database contains 343 molecules, of which 152 have label = '+' (carcinogenic), yielding a percentage of 44.315%. The claim states 73.200%, which does not match the data.

content.content:
CREATE TABLE `atom` (
  `atom_id` TEXT NOT NULL,
  `molecule_id` TEXT DEFAULT NULL,
  `element` TEXT DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`atom_id`),
  FOREIGN KEY (`molecule_id`) REFERENCES `molecule` (`molecule_id`)
);
CREATE TABLE `bond` (
  `bond_id` TEXT NOT NULL,
  `molecule_id` TEXT DEFAULT NULL,
  `bond_type` TEXT DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`bond_id`),
  FOREIGN KEY (`molecule_id`) REFERENCES `molecule` (`molecule_id`)
);
CREATE TABLE `connected` (
  `atom_id` TEXT NOT NULL,
  `atom_id2` TEXT NOT NULL,
  `bond_id` TEXT DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`atom_id`,`atom_id2`),
  FOREIGN KEY (`atom_id`) REFERENCES `atom` (`atom_id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (`atom_id2`) REFERENCES `atom` (`atom_id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (`bond_id`) REFERENCES `bond` (`bond_id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE
);
CREATE TABLE `molecule` (
  `molecule_id` TEXT NOT NULL,
  `label` TEXT DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`molecule_id`)
);

CREATE TABLE `atom` (

  `bond_id` TEXT NOT NULL,
  `molecule_id` TEXT DEFAULT NULL,

  PRIMARY KEY (`bond_id`),
  FOREIGN KEY (`molecule_id`) REFERENCES `molecule` (`molecule_id`)
);
CREATE TABLE `connected` (

  PRIMARY KEY (`atom_id`,`atom_id2`),
  FOREIGN KEY (`atom_id`) REFERENCES `atom` (`atom_id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE,

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claude-code-claimdb/test_dbs/toxicology.sqlite" "SELECT COUNT(*) as total, SUM(CASE WHEN label = '+' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as carcinogenic, ROUND(100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN label = '+' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(molecule_id), 3) as percentage FROM molecule;"

content.text:
The database shows:
- Total molecules: 343
- Carcinogenic (label = '+'): 152
- Percentage: 44.315%

The claim states carcinogenic molecules constitute 73.200% of the dataset, but the actual percentage is 44.315%. This is clearly contradicted.

```json
{"label": "CONTRADICTED", "reasoning": "The database contains 343 molecules, of which 152 have label = '+' (carcinogenic), yielding a percentage of 44.315%. The claim states 73.200%, which does not match the data."}
```
